components.name: accordion
components.desc: Vertically stacked panels that can be expanded or collapsed to show/hide content.

components.name: alert
components.desc: Displays a message to the user, often to convey important information or a status update.

components.name: alert dialog
components.desc: A modal dialog that displays an alert message and allows the user to respond with an action.

components.name: avatar
components.desc: Displays a user's profile picture or initials in a circular or square shape.

components.name: badge
components.desc: A small, often circular, indicator that displays a count or status next to an element.

components.name: button
components.desc: Allows the user to trigger an action or event by clicking or tapping on it.

components.name: card
components.desc: A container that displays content and related actions in a structured, visually appealing way.

components.name: carousel
components.desc: Displays a collection of content (images, text, etc.) in a scrollable, horizontal layout.

components.name: checkbox
components.desc: Allows the user to make a binary choice (on/off, yes/no) by checking or unchecking a box.

components.name: collapsible
components.desc: A container that can be expanded or collapsed to show or hide its content.

components.name: dialog
components.desc: A modal window that displays content or prompts the user for input, blocking the main interface.

components.name: drawer
components.desc: A panel that slides in from the side of the screen, often used for navigation or additional content.

components.name: dropdown menu
components.desc: A menu that appears when the user clicks or hovers over a trigger element, allowing them to select an option.

components.name: form
components.desc: A container for collecting user input, such as text, numbers, or selections.

components.name: input
components.desc: Allows the user to enter and edit text, numbers, or other data.

components.name: label
components.desc: Provides a descriptive text label for an input or other UI element.

components.name: menubar
components.desc: A horizontal menu bar that provides access to various commands or actions.

components.name: navigation menu
components.desc: A menu that allows the user to navigate to different sections or pages of an application.

components.name: progress
components.desc: Displays the current progress of a task or operation, often as a visual bar or circular indicator.

components.name: radio group
components.desc: A set of radio buttons that allow the user to select one option from a group.

components.name: scroll area
components.desc: A container that allows the user to scroll through content that exceeds the available viewport.

components.name: select
components.desc: Allows the user to choose one or more options from a dropdown list.

components.name: separator
components.desc: A visual divider that separates and groups related content or UI elements.

components.name: slider
components.desc: Allows the user to select a value from a range by dragging a handle along a track.

components.name: switch
components.desc: Provides a toggle control that allows the user to enable or disable a setting or option.

components.name: tabs
components.desc: A set of related content panels that can be switched between by clicking on their corresponding tab.

components.name: textarea
components.desc: Allows the user to enter and edit multi-line text, often used for longer form inputs.

components.name: toast
components.desc: A temporary, non-intrusive notification that appears and disappears automatically.

components.name: toggle
components.desc: Provides a switch-like control that allows the user to enable or disable a setting or option.

components.name: tooltip
components.desc: Displays additional information or context when the user hovers over or interacts with an element.
